byline.original: By ERIK ECKHOLM and DANIEL LOVERING

abstract: Amish splinter group near Bergholz, Ohio, led by estranged elder Sam Mullet, is being blamed for a series of assaults on other Amish in eastern Ohio; attacks have stirred fear among Amish and drawn law enforcement involvement, unusual for insular community.
snippet: A splinter group has been blamed for humiliating other Amish by forcibly cutting their beards, shocking the insular community.
lead_paragraph: A splinter group has been blamed for humiliating other Amish by forcibly cutting their beards, shocking the insular community.

headline.main: Amish Renegades Are Accused in Bizarre Attacks on Their Peers
headline.print_headline: Renegade Group Is Accused in Bizarre Attacks on Fellow Amish in Ohio
headline.seo: Hair-Cutting Attacks Stir Fear in Amish Ohio
